title: Pregnant woman labelled 'unprofessional' for work event
title_page: Pregnant woman labelled 'unprofessional' for work event | Daily Mail Online
text:
A woman was left seething after a colleague told her it would be 'unprofessional' to go to a work function with a baby bump.
The expectant mother, who is 25 weeks (just over six months) along, was left stunned after it was suggested she should avoid the 'prestigious' event during a chat by the office photocopier.
She shared her ordeal on Mumsnet, and before long dozens of other women had rushed to her defence, with many sharing their own tales of insulting pregnancy comments which are sure to leave mums-to-be seething.
Commenting on her awkward office encounter, the irked mother-to-be, known only as Crapuccino, chuckled at the prospect of colleagues being offended by the evidence she had been having 'real coitus with a man'.
